{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++20|1= 
constexpr explicit latch( std::ptrdiff_t expected );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++20|1= 
latch( const latch&amp; ) = delete;
}}
{{dcl end}}

@1@ Constructs a {{tt|latch}} and initializes its internal counter. The behavior is undefined if {{c|expected}} is negative or greater than {{lc|max()}}.
@2@ Copy constructor is deleted. {{tt|latch}} is neither copyable nor movable.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|expected|the initial value of the internal counter}}
{{par end}}

===Exceptions===
Throws nothing.
